name: devlab-microservice
description: DEVLAB Microservice - AI-powered learning platform for coding and theoretical exercises

scripts.build: echo 'Root build - use specific frontend/backend builds'
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend build completed - no compilation needed for Node.js'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:frontend:ci && npm run test:backend:ci
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend:fix && npm run lint:backend:fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:coverage
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend

author: DEVLAB Team
